pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:0.2: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:0.3: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:0.5: 77. The training rule on not giving the full admission to trainee nuns
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.1: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.2: a trainee nun went to the nun Thullanandā and asked her for the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.4: “If you give me a robe, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission.” But she neither gave her the full admission, nor made any effort to have her fully admitted.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.5: That trainee nun told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.6: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized her,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.7: “How could Venerable Thullanandā say this to a trainee nun,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.8: but then neither give her the full admission, nor make any effort to have her fully admitted?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.9: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Thullanandā did this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.13: “… How could the nun Thullanandā act in this way?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.15: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.16: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.17.1: ‘If a nun tells a trainee nun, “If you give me a robe, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission,” but she then neither gives her the full admission nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted, then, if there was no obstruction, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.6: one who has trained for two years in the six rules.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.7: “If you give me a robe, Venerable, I’ll give you the full admission”:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.8: I’ll give you the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.9: Then, if there was no obstruction:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.11: She neither gives her the full admission:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.12: does not herself give her the full admission.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.13: Nor makes any effort to have her fully admitted:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.14: does not ask anyone else to give her the full ordination.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.15: If she thinks, “I’ll neither give her the full admission nor make any effort to have her fully admitted,” then by the mere fact of giving up her duty, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.2.3: if she searches for someone to give her the full ordination, but is unable to find anyone;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.2.7: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.2.8: The seventh training rule is finished.
